Claim: "The rise in Arctic temperatures is probably tied to a sudden warming of the stratosphere"
Implication: "The warming of the stratosphere occurred several weeks ago"
Referring expressions: Arctic temperatures, stratosphere  The warming, stratosphere
Formula: (exists b (exists a (IsWarming(a) and IsTiedTo(b)))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsOccurred(a) and IsWarming(c))))
